name: Gust Mashup Costume Set
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

Famed RPG developer Gust - creators of the Atelier series, Nights of Azure, CIEL NOSURGE, and more - lends some of its costumes to the fighters of Dead or Alive! Add some color to your favorite fighter's wardrobe with these new costumes! This set includes all 17 of the Gust Mashup costumes. Costumes for the following characters included: Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, La Mariposa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4 (x2), Nyotengu, and Honoka *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
about_the_game:
Famed RPG developer Gust - creators of the Atelier series, Nights of Azure, CIEL NOSURGE, and more - lends some of its costumes to the fighters of Dead or Alive! Add some color to your favorite fighter's wardrobe with these new costumes!

This set includes all 17 of the Gust Mashup costumes.

Costumes for the following characters included:
Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, La Mariposa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4 (x2), Nyotengu, and Honoka

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
short_description: This set includes all 17 of the Gust Mashup costumes for DOA5LR.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
